summary: You saved the wenches, you found all the cards... or did you!?
descriptionHtml:
BASED ON: Buxom Wench Yuriana -Tank Healer Support Follower- And Captured Wenches

Yuriana's Big Booty adventure introduces more than 20 new cards to find, all featuring your favorite buxom wench!

On mod startup you will find a letter from Yuriana in your inventory detailing her new dilemma! There are even more cards out there!
Find clues in different locations to track down all the perverts hoarding her nakey pics in her most pervy adventure yet.
You will have to use your cunning and wits to discern where the cards are being kept. A la note quests.

You will discover a few new locations as well as revisiting old ones:
Yuriana's flat in Riften
A new bandit lair
A necromancers home.

If you are truly stumped I have included a spoilers txt for the locations.

INSTALL:
Extract the 7zip file to a temporary location then paste the textures folder and ESP into your Skyrim Data directory.

DISCLAIMER:
please understand that these images will not be the same quality featured on lordkoz' original mod, I am new to manipulating images, but I have tried to make them as appealing as I could none the less.

REQUIREMENTS:
This mod doesn't actually require anything, but I highly recommend you download Yuriana if you haven't already.

CREDITS:

A big thank you to lordkoz for his companion mod Buxom Wench Yuriana (https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77903/?) and for allowing me to make this add on to their excellent work.

Thanks to everyone on the Nexus forums for helping me with tutorials and technical tips!
author: mojobo
